item.title: Loading Glove Pre-trained Word Embedding Model from Text File [Faster]
item.description: With the evolution of transfer learning approaches in image processing, the field of Natural Language Processing has also a ubiquitous pre-trained model which is used for multiple states of the art transfer learning solutions for Text classification, Named Entity Recognition. And this pre-trained model is Word Embeddings. Word embedding is a vector representation of vocabulary which is trained following the concept â€œmeaning of the word is carried by its correspondenceâ€ Excuse me if I have misphrased Ahem!
